about_the_game:
Welcome to Retro Endurance 8-bit!

This game, inspired by Wario Ware's gameplay and resembles classic NES shufflers, will challenge you in a really fun and unique way. The main game features an endurance mode that contains a board-game like progression.

The game starts off by randomly picking some games from your current unlocked collection of games. You then start playing the other games and keep switching between them for 3 rounds. In the last round of each game, the game runs at around 2x the speed. It sounds chaotic, but it's actually very fun as all the games are well designed around this mechanic.

It also includes an arcade mode where you can unlock some of the games and play them individually. There is also a split screen local competitive multiplayer mode and a high-score challenge mode where you challenge others on the leaderboard.

Plus a good number of games!

It's got 24 classic retro game recreations with more coming soon! A lot of care has been put into every single game.

Features:

  • Solo developed game. Designed, coded, drawn, and composed by zsKnight.

  • Simple, yet fun and addictive game design

  • The early access build includes 24 classic retro style games with more to come

  • Representing multiple genres including racing, platformer, adventure, RPG, sports, shoot 'em ups, card, puzzle, and more!

  • Random generation algorithms in all games so they will feel different each time you play.

  • Unique boss battles where you battle the boss while constantly switching between different game genres until you deplete its hit points.

  • An arcade mode where you can unlock each game individually and play them as if they are an arcade game. Currently includes 6 arcade games with more coming soon!

  • Split screen local competitive multiplayer. Play each other side by side with the same randomly picked game sequence order and with the same random deterministic values for fairness. At the end of the multiplayer session, you can also see a breakdown on how you both did on each separate game against your opponent.

  • Daily challenges! In the daily challenge mode, there will be a new challenge every day with a fixed sequence of games with leaderboard support. Daily challenges unlocks at level 5.

  • More games will be added and included free in future updates. The price will increase as more games are added, so buy early while the price is low!

  • Many secrets and easter eggs to be discovered!

Future Plans

First will be the release of the early access build with 24 classic retro style games ready for you to play. It will then continue to grow from there with new game segments and bosses released on a regular basis as long as there is an active community. Once there is a good amount of games, more content will be added to each of the previously created games. The previously created games will also be updated with new content.

There are other features planned such as a custom play mode and online play. These modes will be implemented depending on the growth of this game in addition to the number of concurrent players for online play.

short_description: Challenge yourself in this unique take on 8bit retro game compilations. Contains 24 retro game recreations with more coming regularly. Includes an endurance mode, arcade mode, local split-screen competitive multiplayer, and daily challenges!
